original: 河內懷縣人，「竹林七賢」之一。與嵇康、呂安等人相交，喜談老莊，曾為《莊子》作注，但未完成就過世。其所論述影響後世郭象等玄學家。
text: Native of Huai County, Hanoi, one of the "Seven Sages of the Bamboo Forest". Interacted with Ji Kang, Lu An and others, liked to talk about Lao-Zhuang, and once made a note on "Zhuangzi", but died before completion. The discussion influences later metaphysicians such as Guo Xiang.
